DOC.criteria: Male female , age 18 year Strongly suspect renal arterial disease Scheduled ( schedule ) undergo arterial catheterbased Xray angiography examination Known grade IV V chronic kidney disease ( GFR < 30 mL/min/1.73m² ) Contraindication MRI Acute renal dysfunction within 6 month precede Dotarem®enhanced MRA examination
